snippet.title: Amber Heard SUPER EXPOSED: People SPEAK OUT in Support of Johnny Depp | Trend Craze
snippet.description:
Amber Heard SUPER EXPOSED: People SPEAK OUT in Support of Johnny Depp | Trend Craze

Amber Heard, and Johnny Depp's publicized legal battle has been going on for years. We've heard multiple sides to the story, absurd rumours and a few confirmations here and there from the stars themselves. In today's video, we will be looking at the recent support that has surfaced for Johnny depps version of the story.

Actress Amber Heard and British tabloid The Sun said they were vindicated after a UK court on Thursday refused Johnny Depp the right to appeal against a ruling that he was a wife-beater. The Hollywood actor had sought to challenge a November 2020 ruling in a high-profile libel action that upheld claims in the newspaper that he beat Heard during their stormy marriage. A spokeswoman for Heard said she was was "pleased -- but by no means surprised by the decision", adding the "evidence presented in the UK case was overwhelming and undeniable".
